data.name: Radar Power Loss
data.response: Reset Sensor, Contact Listed Point Of Contact, Replace Sensor Feed with replacement sensor data

data.name: Sensor Alignment Drift
data.data: Average Sat Altitude, Average Sat Data, Average Sat Detection Rate

data.name: Low Correlation With Catalog
data.response: Immediatly Escalate to Listed Point of Contact
data.data: Known Object Catalog, Detected Object Database

data.name: Un-cataloged object detected
data.response: Determine root cause. Generate additional tasking
data.data: Rate of new object detection,correlation with other un-cataloged objects detected
